meanings.definition: Tacky or overly sentimental in a way that is considered to be in poor taste.
meanings.sent1: The decorations at the party were kitschier than expected.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was kitschier than the rest of the group.
meanings.sent3: The kitschier the better, they said as they hung up the neon lights.
meanings.sent4: The room looked like a kitschier version of a vintage store.
meanings.sent5: The painting was so kitschier that it made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: Excessively garish or showy in a way that is considered to be cheap or vulgar.
meanings.sent1: The new car was even kitschier than the one before.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry she wore was kitschier than anything I had seen.
meanings.sent3: He proudly displayed his kitschier collection of trinkets.
meanings.sent4: The dress was kitschier than a disco ball under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign outside the diner was kitschier than the entire street.
